mapper.select: SELECT mem.id, admin.name, CAST(admin.date as CHAR) as date, admin.shift, mem.uuid, admin.priority, mem.process FROM member mem LEFT JOIN admin_shift admin ON mem.name = admin.name WHERE admin.priority IN (1,2) AND (DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), "%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(admin.date, "%Y-%m-%d"))
select A.name, CAST(A.date as CHAR) as date, A.shift, A.priority, B.process FROM admin_shift A LEFT JOIN member B on A.name = B.name where A.date = #{dateInfo}
